name: State building code; prohibitions
text:
Hawaii state building codes; prohibitions.  In adopting the Hawaii state building codes, the council shall not adopt provisions that:
     (1)  Relate to administrative, permitting, or enforcement and inspection procedures of each county; or
     (2)  Conflict with chapters 444 and 464. [L 2007, c 82, pt of §2; am L 2014, c 164, §7]
